class.name: SxShader
class.description: Static attribute handling. + Used for the lack of support for static attributes in GDScript. This class piggybacks on Engine.set_meta/Engine.get_meta.

method.name: set_static_attribute
method.description:
Set a static attribute for a specific namespace & attribute name.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- SxAttr.set_static_attribute("MyNamespace", "foo", "bar") ----

method.name: setup_static_attribute
method.description:
Setup a static attribute, mostly used to set default values. + If the attribute already exists, this method will not do anything. To override the attribute, use `set_static_attribute` instead.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- SxAttr.setup_static_attribute("MyNamespace", "foo", "default") ----

method.name: has_static_attribute
method.description:
Check if the static attribute exists.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- if SxAttr.has_static_attribute("MyNamespace", "foo"): print("OK !") ----

method.name: get_static_attribute
method.description:
Get a static attribute value. + Return a default value if it does not exist.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_value := SxAttr.get_static_attribute("MyNamespace", "foo", "bar") as String ----
